scripts.eas-build-pre-install: cd ../../ && node ./tools/scripts/listRootDependencies.js && cp yarn.lock ./packages/susi/ && (bash -c "[ ! -z \"$EAS_BUILD_NPM_CACHE_URL\" ] && sed -i -e \"s#https://registry.yarnpkg.com#$EAS_BUILD_NPM_CACHE_URL#g\" yarn.lock" || true)
scripts.postinstall: rm -r node_modules && cd ../../ && yarn install && npx nx sync-deps susi && npx nx ensure-symlink susi
